page.title: 02Snape School, Yorkshire.
page.content: In our school there are 3 teachers and 28 children. School lasts from 9 a.m. to 3-30 p.m. The school is quite small, and inside there is a big room and a little room. The building is about 105 years old. We have a garden with a bit of grass where we sometimes play. Also we have two playgrounds, one for the infants and one for the juniors. At school we have a clerical assistant and a dinner lady. Sometimes the boys play football and rounders at the playing field, and the girls stay at school and have drama. At Christmas we have a party and we play games and have tea.
